document.full_text: brazilian government officials said that they would crack down on cattle ranchers in the amazon after new data showed that deforestation there had increased by 26 percent.
document.title: the americas: brazil: government vows crackdown on cattle ranchers in the amazon
lines_and_colors: brazilian government officials said that they would crack down on cattle ranchers in the amazon after new data showed that deforestation there had increased by 26 percent.
